thread.title: The Circus rolls into Merry Hill shopping centre
thread.title_full: The Circus rolls into Merry Hill shopping centre

title: The Circus rolls into Merry Hill shopping centre
text:
Gandeys Human Thrill Circus will run at the centre between October 23 and November 1. For more information on events in and around the Black Country click here . What do you think? Be the first to comment 
The circus big top will be on the centre’s North Street car park during half term. 
The first show will start at 7.30pm on October 23 and further shows will run at 2pm and 5pm during the week. For tickets click here . Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star 
We'll send a morning digest of the day's biggest news and sport stories straight to your inbox. Email Address
